description: Try our easy to follow Pancetta Spaghetti Carbonara recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pancetta Spaghetti Carbonara Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to instructions on the box.
Meanwhile, saut√© the Pancetta with oil until crispy.
In a bowl mix the yolks, the Pecorino Romano cheese, black pepper and salt. Stir in 1/3 cup of the cooking water to loosen up the mixture.
Drain the pasta al dente, then toss with the crispy Pancetta.
Stir in the yolk mixture and mix well over very low heat until the sauce starts to thicken, but make sure the eggs do not become overcooked.
Serve immediately with more cracked pepper and grated Pecorino Romano cheese.
